Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki Phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

	The Social Media Manager will be responsible for building and managing Luxsit Integration&rsquo;s digital presence across social media platforms.
	The role focuses on brand visibility, audience engagement, lead generation, and showcasing completed projects and solutions in a compelling and professional manner.

	Develop and implement social media strategies aligned with business goals.

	Promote company projects, services, and brand values through consistent storytelling.
	Monitor social media performance and prepare regular analytics reports.
	Collaborate with sales, marketing, and technical teams on campaigns and launches.
	Stay up to date with social media trends, tools, and best practices.


Requirements &amp; Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Marketing, Communications, Media, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience managing social media accounts for brands or businesses.
	Strong content creation, copywriting, and visual storytelling skills.
	Familiarity with social media management and analytics tools.
	Creative mindset with attention to detail and consistency.
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.


Competencies:


	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Creativity and innovation
	Time management and organization
	Analytical thinking and reporting skills


Salary
N150,000 monthly.

Method of Application

	The Social Media Manager will be responsible for building and managing Luxsit Integration’s digital presence across social media platforms.
	The role focuses on brand visibility, audience engagement, lead generation, and showcasing completed projects and solutions in a compelling and professional manner.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement social media strategies aligned with business goals.
	Create, schedule, and publish engaging content (text, images, videos) across platforms such as Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, and X.
	Manage daily social media activities, including comments, messages, and inquiries.
	Promote company projects, services, and brand values through consistent storytelling.
	Monitor social media performance and prepare regular analytics reports.
	Collaborate with sales, marketing, and technical teams on campaigns and launches.
	Stay up to date with social media trends, tools, and best practices.


Requirements & Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Media, or a related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience managing social media accounts for brands or businesses.
	Strong content creation, copywriting, and visual storytelling skills.
	Familiarity with social media management and analytics tools.
	Creative mindset with attention to detail and consistency.
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.


Competencies:


	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Creativity and innovation
	Time management and organization
	Analytical thinking and reporting skills


Salary
N150,000 monthly.

Method of Application

Business Development Officer Job at Luxsit Integration




        
    

        
        Luxsit Integration is a Custom Integrated and Smart home solution firm located in HEART OF LAGOS, NIGERIA. Our main focus is to bring people and technology together. We handle all aspects of your technology project including design, scheduling, project management, installation, and service and support. AT Luxsit integration – whether the project is new construction or retrofit, we integrate seamlessly with all involved to deliver custom, lifestyle inspired solutions across the spectrum of automation, audio/video, cinema rooms, lighting, climate, and security.

Job Location: Lekki phase 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

	The Business Development Officer will drive revenue growth by identifying new business opportunities, building client relationships, and expanding Luxsit Integration’s market presence.


Key Responsibilities


	Identify and pursue new business opportunities and partnerships.
	Develop and maintain strong relationships with clients and stakeholders.
	Prepare proposals, quotations, and presentations.

Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field.

	Strong negotiation and communication skills.

	Goal-oriented with a strong drive for results.

N150,000 monthly.
